deposit(uint256,uint256).details: Automatically matches Charm vault's current USD1:WLFI ratio

getTotalAmounts().details: Returns (WLFI, USD1) to match IStrategy interface - CRITICAL ORDER!

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

rescueIdleTokens().details: Returns any tokens sitting idle in this contract back to vault

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdraw(uint256).details: Returns (WLFI, USD1) to match IStrategy interface - CRITICAL ORDER!

params.value: USD value to withdraw (simplified - treats USD1 and WLFI as equal value)

constructor.notice: Creates CharmStrategyUSD1 for USD1/WLFI Charm pool

getTotalAmounts().notice: Get total amounts managed by strategy (proportional to our shares)

initializeApprovals().notice: Initialize all required approvals for strategy to work

rescueIdleTokens().notice: Rescue idle tokens (not in Charm vault)

setCharmVault(address).notice: Set Charm vault (if not set in constructor)

setTokenApproval(address,address,uint256.notice: Set token approval (owner only) - for fixing approval issues
